ProductInfo.Features:
Processor - INTEL Core 2 Duo 2200 MHz || Memory Installed - 4096mb DDR3 > Upgradeable to 8192MB
Hard Drive - 160Gig Serial ATA || Optical Drive - DVD ROM || Screen Size - 14.0" WideScreen LCD
Internet Connection(s) - The installed 802 11 ABG WI-FI card will allow you to connect to any available wireless network, and the internal Ethernet port will allow a high speed wired connection
Software Installed - NEW Windows 7 Home Premium 32 Bit, word document & spreadsheet applications, shortcut to Microsofts free virus protection along with a restore partition on the hard drive for easy reinstallation. All software is Genuine!!
What's in the Box? - Lenovo ThinkPad R400 with NEW pre-installed software, power cord, software registration instructions and a 60 day Warranty
ProductInfo.Name: Lenovo ThinkPad R400 INTEL Core 2 Duo 2200 MHz 160Gig Serial ATA HDD 4096mb DDR3 DVD ROM Wireless WI-FI 14.0" WideScreen LCD Genuine Windows 7 Home Premium 32 Bit Laptop Notebook Computer
